name: jots-inbox-processor
description: A plugin to process files from an 'Inbox' at a set interval.

scripts.build: node --no-warnings ./node_modules/vite/bin/vite.js build && node --input-type=module -e "import { copyFileSync } from 'fs'; copyFileSync('src/styles.css', 'dist/styles.css');"
scripts.postbuild: node --input-type=module -e "import { mkdirSync, copyFileSync, existsSync } from 'fs'; import { dirname } from 'path'; ['./', './assets/'].forEach(dir => !existsSync(dir) && mkdirSync(dir, { recursive: true })); copyFileSync('dist/main.js', './main.js'); copyFileSync('dist/styles.css', './assets/styles.css');"

author: Joseph Fieber
